Package com.limelight.videosdk

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ContentService.ChannelCallback
    A delegate for getting the response back from the call for fetching channels.
    ContentService.ChannelGroupCallback
    A delegate for getting the response back from the call for fetching Channel Group.
    ContentService.EncodingsCallback
    A delegate for getting the response back from the call for fetching Encoding.
    ContentService.IndividualChannelCallback
    A delegate for getting the response back from the call for fetching individual channel.
    ContentService.IndividualMediaCallback
    A delegate for getting the response back from the call for fetching individual Media.
    ContentService.MediaCallback
    A delegate for getting the response back from the call for fetching Media.
    IMediaControllerCallback
    This acts as an interface between PlayerFragment and VideoPlayerView.
    IPlayerCallback
    This is the callback to be sent to activity from Player.
    IPlayerControl
    This interface is the control to the Player.
    A child object of this interface is supplied to the Activity which requested for the Player.
    IPlaylistCallback
    This interface is the callback for playlist.
    MediaControl.FullScreenCallback  
    WidevineManager.WVCallback  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnalyticsReporter
    This class is used to report analytics data to Limelight analytics server.
    Constants
    This class contains the constants being used in LimelightVideoSDK
    ContentService
    This class facilitates developer and SDK in making requests to Lime light server and fetching various data like channel group, channels,media and encodings.
    DateDeserializer
    This class is the Deserializer for date data received in JSON response.
    FullScreenPlayer
    This class will play the video in full screen.
    LogConfigurator
    This class configures the logger like resetting the configuration, adding appender to the logger, configuring file appender which includes maximum number of backed up log files,maximum size of log file until rolling and logging format
    LoggerUtil
    This class has methods to configure Logging and to Log the messages.
    MediaControl
    This class is custom MediaController to support Full Screen and also to add a full screen button to the default MediaController.
    PlayerFragment
    This class is the player and is the customized fragment which also contains customized android player VideoPlayerview.
    PlayerSupportFragment
    This class is the player and is the customized fragment which also contains customized android player VideoPlayerview.
    RequestExecutor
    This class executes the analytics reporting requests serially and it also caches the request when network is disconnected.
    ThumbnailDeserializer
    This class is the Deserializer for thumbnail data received in JSON response.
    TimeDeserializer
    This class is the Deserializer for time data received in Json response.
    UriDeserializer
    This class is the Deserializer for URI data received in Json response.
    URLAuthenticator
    This class helps in signing the URL requests using developer secret and access key.
    VideoPlayerView
    This class is a wrapper around the android player default player view.
    WidevineManager
    This class manages all the widevine related functionality.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Constants.Message
    Various message states.
    status 0
    error 1
    progress 2
    Constants.PlayerState
    Various play states.
    Playing 0
    Paused 1
    Stopped 2
    Completed 3
    Constants.WidevineStatus
    Various Widevine status values
